column3: This could also check "signed ACKs" (and say, mark them specially, if they match the expected key for the user) if we're going there in the future.
@laanwj I was going to suggest that as a stretch goal, so concept ACK that. Would be nice to see local pgp sigs validated.

FWIW I merged 15651 using this, seems to work as expected:

![merge 15651](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/126646/59697903-ee6ee600-91ee-11e9-80c8-e2a349f172e3.png)

ACK 0e01e4522e0f9e2e994f80fc61f40d61a4a70d79

Did some quick testing merging this PR on master (c8fee6769a106bb5fbcdd3674fd0444b01d3391c), then merging another PR on top.

PR with `ACKs`:
![some ACKs](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/863730/60009605-bf51ec00-96a8-11e9-918a-9b7ceb7fb940.png)

PR with no `ACKs`:
![no ACKs](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/863730/600
@laanwj @instagibbs Opened #16280 to track the pgp related github-merge additions.
